title: Why Can't I Buy Gold with Steem Yet - Crypto Economics & Coin Caps
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Analysis of why cryptocurrencies should connect to real assets like gold, plus detailed explanation of coin economics, inflation, caps, and the history of crypto value

main_thesis.question: Why Can't I buy Gold with Steem Yet?
main_thesis.proposal_history: Proposed in 2015-2016, whales upvoted but did nothing
main_thesis.impact: This is how to make Steem $20 each
main_thesis.frustration: The community should be asking this question, not just the author

bitcoin_future.payment: Miners paid in other currencies OR users charged high fees

economics_thesis.real_value: Cryptocurrency value comes from utility - being used to purchase things
economics_thesis.gold_connection: Linking crypto to real assets like gold increases utility and value
economics_thesis.steem_potential: If you could buy gold with Steem, Steem becomes more valuable

quiz_questions.q: According to @marsresident, where does Bitcoin's value actually come from?
quiz_questions.a: Novelty and being used to purchase things - NOT from greed or security
quiz_questions.explanation: Started with Silk Road purchases - utility drives value

quiz_questions.q: What is Devcoin's inflation rate and why is it problematic?
quiz_questions.a: 180 Billion Devcoins made every month, no cap - extremely inflationary
quiz_questions.explanation: Holding is like holding milk not gold - needs constant market expansion

quiz_questions.q: What happens when Bitcoin reaches its cap?
quiz_questions.a: Mining continues in pools, miners paid in other currencies or users pay high fees
quiz_questions.explanation: No new coins means different economic model

quiz_questions.q: Why did Dogecoin succeed despite starting as a joke?
quiz_questions.a: People passed out 50,000-100,000 DOGE freely, continued even when value increased

quiz_questions.q: What is the only way to sustain an uncapped inflationary coin?
quiz_questions.a: Constantly expanding the market until global adoption - or colonize Moon and Mars
